short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NinjaView - Seamlessly integrate your trading strategies between TradingView and NinjaTrader. Now with Trade Copier!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension's sole purpose is to capture and process trading alerts from TradingView and facilitate automatic trades on NinjaTrader based on these alerts. Choose from a local alert capture or your very own private webhook!
